name: Rogalik (itch)
description:
You are stranded in a strange dungeon.

Survive!
  • Pick one of many weapons to fight with
  • Be careful! With each stage, enemies get stronger
  • Collect gold and buy upgrades
Features
  • Randomly generated world
  • Unique enemies
Credits
  • Art: 0x72
  • Music: Bartosh

Made with pygame
